definition: finch (family Fringillidae)
a freckle/lentigo
small bird/sparrow/also pr. [qiao3]
kind/type/class/category/similar/like/to resemble

sentences.english: Finches are small, compact birds 3-10 in. (10-27 cm) long.
sentences.chinese: 雀类体型小而结实，体长10～27公分。

sentences.english: In fact, the finches no longer look very finchlike at all.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，这些达尔文雀的样子已经不太像雀类了。

sentences.english: Many finches are brightly coloured, often with shades of red and yellow.
sentences.chinese: 许多雀类羽色鲜艳，常有深浅不同的红色和黄色。
